titleStmt.title: Anne Blue v. John W. Williams, Mary S. Williams, & William S. Colquhoun. Summons of John W. Williams, Mary S. Williams, & William S. Colquhoun

bibl.title: Summons of John W. Williams, Mary S. Williams, & William S. Colquhoun
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the original.

org.orgName: United States. Circuit Court (District of Columbia)

div2.p:
District of Columbia, to wit:
The United States of America,
To the Marshal of the District of Columbia, Greeting:

You are hereby commanded to summon John W. Williams Mary S. Williams & William S Colquhoun if they shall be found in the County of Washington, that they be and appear in the Circuit Court of the District of Columbia, at rules to be held for the County of Washington, at the City of Washington, on the first 4th Monday of November next, to answer to bill of complaint of the petition for freedom Anne Blue filed in Court here against them and others.
Hereof fail not at your peril; and have you then and there this precept.
Witness the Hon. W Cranch, Chief Judge of the said Court.

p.del: Memorandum: The defendant to enter appearance in the suit, on or before the day on which the above subpoena is returnable, otherwise the bill may be taken pro confesso.

div2.p:
Anne Blue
vs
John W. Williams
Mary S. Williams &
Wm. S Colquhoun

Sumd all John W Williams & Mary S Williams all
A Hunter
Marshal
